summary: An ordinance appropriating money from the general fund to Hans Pederson in payment of claim against the City of Seattle for money obtained by the city in interest on funds withheld on his contract for the construction of the 15th Avenue Northwest bridge, under Ordinance No. and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. Ordinance No. 34219.
